originalText.text:
Oh my goodness! AWESOME produces. Forever grateful to you dr. Grossman and Micheal( for the listening ear) and sending products my way.Products helping serious eye issues for retina detachment, and other issues is as follows; taking 3 , three times a day
Advanced eye and vision
Support formula
Carlson, Super omega 3
Krill oil, 1000mg
Myco brain support
Here's wishing you continued success Dr. Grossman and Michael!

Very truly yours,
Barbara montano

originalText.text: About 11 years ago i got hives (urticaria) for the 1st time in my life. I went to the ER at north shore hospital in LI.  The hives did not go away.    I started treatments by going to a local doctor in Bayside NY.  The doctor put me on a regiment of Benadryl and corticosteroids.  Nothing worked.  I went through about 7 doctors and a bunch of treatments.  I got diagnosed with Lupus, Vasculitis, others told me Leukemia and a bunch of other diseases My 8th doctor was Doctor Blum Rheumatologist  at Columbia.  After he examined me he recommended Dr. Grossman.  I really believe that if it was not for Doctor Grossman I would still be running around trying to find out what I have.  Although we never found out the cause Dr. Grossman saved my life and sanity by trying methods to help me.  It took him 6 weeks to do what others did not in 2 years of hives.  The hives went away and I only had one flare up after that.  Doctor Grossman is the best dermatologist in NY.  I would recommend Doctor Grossman to anyone with any kind of skin ailment.
